refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Implemented Interfaces
refsect1.para: GduPoolTreeModel implements GtkTreeModel, GtkTreeDragSource, GtkTreeDragDest, GtkTreeSortable and GtkBuildable.
GduSizeWidget implements AtkImplementorIface, GtkBuildable and GtkOrientable.
GduDetailsTable implements AtkImplementorIface, GtkBuildable and GtkOrientable.
GduButtonTable implements AtkImplementorIface, GtkBuildable and GtkOrientable.

refsect1.title: Signals
refsect1.synopsis: "changed" : Run Last "changed" : Run Last "activated" : Run Last "changed" : Run Last "changed" : Run Last "clicked" : Run Last

refsect2.title: The "time" property
refsect2.para: The time (a GTimeVal) used for computing the label of the string.

refsect2.title: The "lines" property
refsect2.para: The number of lines to animate.

refsect2.title: The "pools" property
refsect2.para: The pools displayed - this must be a GPtrArray of GduPool objects.

refsect2.title: The "root" property
refsect2.para: NULL to include all GduPresentable objects in "pool", otherwise only include presentables that are descendents of this GduPresentable.

refsect2.title: The "flags" property
refsect2.para: Flags from the GduPoolTreeViewFlags enumeration to customize behavior of the view.

refsect2.title: The "pool-tree-model" property
refsect2.para: The GduPoolTreeModel instance we are getting information from

refsect2.title: The "drives" property
refsect2.para: Array of drives to use for the array.

refsect2.title: The "name" property
refsect2.para: The requested name for the array.

refsect2.title: The "size" property
refsect2.para: The requested size of the array.

refsect2.title: The "stripe-size" property
refsect2.para: The requested stripe size of the array.

refsect2.title: The "max-size" property
refsect2.para: The maximum size that can be selected.

refsect2.title: The "min-size" property
refsect2.para: The minimum size that can be selected.

refsect2.title: The "changed" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (GduSizeWidget *gdusizewidget, gpointer user_data) : Run Last

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
